name: Project Luna (itch)
description:
FriendlySadist@Terminal1:~/Home$ cat GameDescription.txt

_____________________________________________________________________

In this Sci-fi realistic psychological horror story adventure. You find yourself tasked with rehabilitating abandoned outposts on the moon, as you uncover a deeply hidden mystery.

Use your knowledge and intelligence to make your way through layers of security in every outpost, make the most out of the realistic computer terminals as you execute exploits and abuse vulnerabilities to access places and see things you shouldn't.
